CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera gravity – stronger values pull view toward center
CONTROLS.NAME: gravity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Glow sphere radius – larger values expand central atmosphere
CONTROLS.NAME: glow_radius

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Fractal offset – shifts 4D structure of apollonian pattern
CONTROLS.NAME: fractal_offset

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Color palette shift – adjusts base hue and tint
CONTROLS.NAME: color_base

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media overlay opacity – blend loaded media into scene
CONTROLS.NAME: media_opacity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Spectrum bars opacity – visibility of audio visualization
CONTROLS.NAME: bars_opacity

DESCRIPTION: Drift through an abyssal fractal ecosystem where bioluminescent organisms pulse and flow in 4D space. Apollonian structures bloom into delicate tendrils, their spectral glow shifting through color palettes as your camera orbits through gravity wells in this mesmerizing deep-sea dreamscape.
TITLE: Submerged Spectral Shimmering Siphonophores
